item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 27 January–2 February 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:

item.title: Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 27 January–2 February 2025 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Voxmeter, 27 January–2 February 2025 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Radikale Venstre (RE): 3.2–5.7%
  • Venstre (RE): 7.8–11.5%
  • Dansk Folkeparti (PfE): 3.3–5.9%
  • Borgernes Parti (NI): 1.4–3.3%
  • Socialistisk Folkeparti (Greens/EFA): 12.8–17.2%
  • Socialdemokraterne (S&D): 18.0–23.0%
  • Moderaterne (RE): 2.7–5.0%
  • Danmarksdemokraterne (ECR): 8.3–12.0%
  • Liberal Alliance (EPP): 10.4–14.4%
  • Alternativet (Greens/EFA): 0.9–2.4%
  • Det Konservative Folkeparti (EPP): 6.3–9.6%
  • Enhedslisten–De Rød-Grønne (GUE/NGL): 5.8–9.0%
